front.title: Specification of the Qualitative Service Type

abstract.t: This draft describes the use of RSVP [RFC2205] with applicationsthat do not have resource requirements that are readily quantifiableper the standard Intserv token-bucket model (qualitativeapplications). We introduce the 'qualitative' service-type. Thisservice-type can be used in conjunction with RSVP signaling tomanage the allocation of network resources to traffic originatingfrom qualitative applications. This mode of RSVP usage isparticularly applicable to networks that combine differentiatedservice (diff-serv) QoS mechanisms with RSVP signaling [intdiff].
